fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Footprints: The first time you complete a trade, learn if the other player wins with the King at the end of the phase (Uncertain). 
- Files: Learn a non-Order role that is present in the game (True).  [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Detect: Pick 3 non-King players that aren’t yourself. Learn if the majority of them either win or don’t win with the King at the end of the phase (Uncertain). [3 uses, 3 CD, Astral, Unlocks D2] 
- Trace: Pick a card and a player. Learn if that player played that card. [3 uses, 2 CD, Astral]
- Documents: Gain a non-special item card of your choice. Gain a use for every 3 players you outlive. [1 use, 1 CD, Recharging, 0/3]
